flawed_nl_solution:
Toby has 60 friends because 33 / 0.55 = <<33/0.55=60>>60
42% of his friends are girls because 100 - 55 = <<100-55=42>>42
He has 25.2 friends who are girls because 60 x 0.42 = <<25.2=25.2>>25.2
#### 25.199999999999996

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 42. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
